Federal Register: 141. Isodrin (CAS No. 000465-73-6) (CERCLA; EPCRA EHS; RCRA APP8; RCRA P) (Ref. 8). Measured aquatic acute toxicity data for isodrin include a 24-hour LC sub 50 of 12 ppb for bluegills and a 24-hour LC sub 50 of 6 ppb for minnows. EPA believes that there is sufficient evidence for listing isodrin on EPCRA section 313 pursuant to EPCRA section 313(d)(2)(C) based on the environmental toxicity data for this chemical.
